00162   void initializeControlPointVector (std::list<int> & control_points)
00163   {
00164     Controls & cs (Controls::instance()); 
00165     control_points.clear();
00166     for (int i=0;i<static_cast<int>(raw_points.size());i++)
00167     {
00168       control_points.push_back(i);
00169       if (cs.getReturnInterpolatedRawPoints())
00170       {
00171         control_points.push_back(i);
00172         control_points.push_back(i);
00173       }
00174     }
00175     control_points.push_back(0);
00176     if (cs.getReturnInterpolatedRawPoints())
00177     {
00178       control_points.push_back(0);
00179       control_points.push_back(0);
00180     }
00181     else
00182     {
00183       control_points.push_back(1);
00184       control_points.push_back(2);
00185     }
00186   }
00187

00211   bool fewButKeep (void)
00212   {
00213     if (static_cast<int>(raw_points.size())<4 &&
00214        static_cast<int>(raw_points.size())>=
00215         Controls::instance().getPtPerContourThreshold())
00216     {
00217       std::cout << "Contour '" << getName()
00218                 << "' on section " << getSection()
00219                 << " with " << getNumRawPoints()
00220                 << " raw points passed unaltered since insufficient number "
00221                 << "of points (4) for splining but exceeds user threshold ("
00222                 << Controls::instance().getPtPerContourThreshold()
00223                 << ")." << std::endl;
00224       return true;
00225     }
00226     else
00227     {
00228       return false;
00229     }
00230   }
00231 
00237   bool fewOmit (void)
00238   {
00239     if (static_cast<int>(raw_points.size())<4 &&
00240        static_cast<int>(raw_points.size())<
00241         Controls::instance().getPtPerContourThreshold())
00242     {
00243       std::cout << "Contour '" << getName()
00244                 << "' on section " << getSection()
00245                 << " with " << getNumRawPoints()
00246                 << " raw points omited since insufficient number "
00247                 << "of points for either splining (4) or to exceed threshold ("
00248                 << Controls::instance().getPtPerContourThreshold()
00249                 << ")." << std::endl;
00250       return true;
00251     }
00252     else
00253     {
00254       return false;
00255     }
00256   }

00262   void clearRadiusCurvatureLogFiles (void)
00263   {
00264     char filename[256];
00265     sprintf(filename,"%s%s_%i_radius_curvature.log",
00266             Controls::instance().getOutputDir(),getName(),getSection());
00267     FILE *F = fopen(filename,"w");
00268     if (!F) { printf("Could not open output file %s\n",filename); return; }
00269     fclose(F);
00270   }

00336 private:
00343   int calculateNumSamples (const int & num_splines)
00344   {
00345     assert(num_splines>0);
00346     Controls & cs (Controls::instance()); 
00347     double total_spline_length = 0.0;
00348     for (int i=0;i<num_splines;i++)
00349     {
00350       total_spline_length += getSplineLength(i,1.0);
00351     }
00352     assert(total_spline_length>0.0);
00353     double N_min = total_spline_length/cs.getMaxSampleInterval();
00354     double N_max = total_spline_length/cs.getMinSampleInterval();
00355     int a = N_min + (N_max-N_min)*cs.getAdditionalPointsFactor();
00356     if (a>2) return a;
00357     return static_cast<int>(N_max);
00358   }
00359 
00363   void setOffset (void)
00364   {
00365     double min_radius_of_curvature = 1E30;
00366     for (c_d_iterator i=final_radius_of_curvature.begin();i!=final_radius_of_curvature.end();i++)
00367     {
00368       if (*i<min_radius_of_curvature) min_radius_of_curvature = *i;
00369     }
00370     radius_of_curvature_offset = fabs(min_radius_of_curvature)+1.0;
00371   }
00372 
00380   double evalSprime (const double & t,const int & spline_index) const
00381   {
00382     // evaluate function f(t) at integration steps
00383     // f(t) = Sqrt[(cx + 2 bx t + 3 ax t^2)^2 + (cy + 2 by t + 3 ay t^2)^2]
00384     double a = getCx(spline_index)+
00385            2.0*getBx(spline_index)*t+
00386            3.0*getAx(spline_index)*t*t;
00387     double b = getCy(spline_index)+
00388            2.0*getBy(spline_index)*t+
00389            3.0*getAy(spline_index)*t*t;
00390     return sqrt(a*a + b*b);
00391   }
00392 
00397   double calculateTotalPathLength (void)
00398   {
00399     double total_length = 0.0;
00400     for (c_d_iterator i = spline_lengths.begin();i!=spline_lengths.end();i++)
00401     {
00402       total_length += *i;
00403     }
00404     return total_length;
00405   }
00406 
00411   void initCurveLengths (const int & num_splines)
00412   {
00413     spline_lengths.clear();
00414     for (int i=0;i<num_splines;i++)
00415     {
00416       spline_lengths.push_back(calculateSplineLength(i,1.0));
00417     }
00418   }

00425   double getControlPointX (const int & spline_index,
00426                            const int & control_point_number) const
00427   {
00428     int raw_points_index = cp.getControlPointIndex(4*spline_index+control_point_number);
00429 #ifndef NOASSERT
00430     assert(raw_points_index>=0);
00431     assert(raw_points_index<static_cast<int>(raw_points.size()));
00432 #endif
00433     return raw_points[raw_points_index].getX();
00434   }
00435 
00441   double getControlPointY (const int & spline_index,
00442                            const int & control_point_number) const
00443   {
00444     int raw_points_index = cp.getControlPointIndex(4*spline_index+control_point_number);
00445 #ifndef NOASSERT
00446     assert(raw_points_index>=0);
00447     assert(raw_points_index<static_cast<int>(raw_points.size()));
00448 #endif
00449     return raw_points[raw_points_index].getY();
00450   }
00451 
00457   double getAx (const int & spline_index) const
00458   {
00459     return spline_ratio*(-1.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,0)
00460                          +3.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,1)
00461                          -3.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,2)
00462                          +1.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,3));
00463   }
00464 
00470   double getBx (const int & spline_index) const
00471   {
00472     return spline_ratio*( 3.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,0)
00473                          -6.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,1)
00474                          +3.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,2)
00475                          +0.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,3));
00476   }
00477 
00483   double getCx (const int & spline_index) const
00484   {
00485     return spline_ratio*(-3.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,0)
00486                          +0.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,1)
00487                          +3.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,2)
00488                          +0.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,3));
00489   }
00490 
00496   double getDx (const int & spline_index) const
00497   {
00498     return spline_ratio*( 1.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,0)
00499                          +4.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,1)
00500                          +1.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,2)
00501                          +0.0*getControlPointX(spline_index,3));
00502   }
00503 
00509   double getAy (const int & spline_index) const
00510   {
00511     return spline_ratio*(-1.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,0)
00512                          +3.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,1)
00513                          -3.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,2)
00514                          +1.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,3));
00515   }
00516 
00522   double getBy (const int & spline_index) const
00523   {
00524     return spline_ratio*( 3.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,0)
00525                          -6.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,1)
00526                          +3.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,2)
00527                          +0.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,3));
00528   }
00529 
00535   double getCy (const int & spline_index) const
00536   {
00537     return spline_ratio*(-3.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,0)
00538                          +0.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,1)
00539                          +3.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,2)
00540                          +0.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,3));
00541   }
00542 
00548   double getDy (const int & spline_index) const
00549   {
00550     return spline_ratio*( 1.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,0)
00551                          +4.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,1)
00552                          +1.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,2)
00553                          +0.0*getControlPointY(spline_index,3));
00554   }
